Definition: Semicolon-separated list of (internal) study identifiers (cross-referencing to study worksheet) in which the person was involved.
The name of the person (either full name or as used in scientific publications)
The electronic mail address of the person.
An identifier for the data submitter. If that submitter is an individual, ORCID identifiers are recommended.
Type of contribution of the person to the investigation
The institution the person belongs to
